name: Zombie Office (Very Spooky)
description:
(CONTROLLER REQUIRED - Full-screen for best experience!)

The apocalypse is here, but you can't be late for work!

Try not to be eaten alive, or even worse, fired!

Complete your work at the work station to gather money, then bank up to the goal to win! Be sure to budget though, you need that money for bullets too!

Controls

  • Shoot - Right Bumper
  • Move - Left Stick
  • Aim - Right Stick
  • Swap Item - North face button (at buy station)
  • Use Workstation - South face button (at work station, with pencil)

Press start on second controller for 2 player!
